code: @Test public void testClientInvocation() throws Exception {     // set the client's service access point     Client client = new Client("http://localhost:" + port + "/GreeterContext/SOAPMessageService").     // invoke the services     String response = client.invoke().     assertEquals("Get a wrong response", "Greetings from Apache Camel!!!! Request was  Hello Camel!!", response). }

@Override protected AbstractXmlApplicationContext createApplicationContext() {     port = AvailablePortFinder.getNextAvailable().     System.setProperty("port", String.valueOf(port)).     return new ClassPathXmlApplicationContext(new String[] { "/META-INF/spring/CamelCXFProviderRouteConfig.xml" }). }
